TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XamlServices extends System.Object
public ref class XamlServices abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供适用于常见 XAML 任务（读取 XAML 和写入对象图，或者读取对象图并为序列化目的而写入 XAML 文件输出）的更高级别服务（静态方法）。

span.span: Provides higher-level services (static methods) for the common XAML tasks of reading XAML and writing an object graph; or reading an object graph and writing XAML file output for serialization purposes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见 XAML 读取和写入方案中使用的 类的模式依赖于创建 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器的实例。The modes of the class that are used in the most common XAML reading and writing scenarios rely on creating instances of XAML readers and XAML writers. 这些读取器和编写器是专用的，但公共类的内部实现，如 、和 。These readers and writers are specialized but internal implementations of public classes, such as , , and . 若要在大多数情况下使用 ，可以依赖默认的内部实现获取所需的结果。To use for most scenarios, you can rely on the default internal implementations to obtain the results that you want. 对于更多的专用方案，你可以自行定义读取器和编写器，然后将它们作为 方法的重载的参数进行传递。For more specialized scenarios, you might define readers and writers yourself, and then pass them as arguments for overloads of the methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果正在处理 WPF 定义的类型或基于 WPF 的类型，则不推荐使用 XAML 读取或 XAML 编写 API 集。 is not the recommended XAML reading or XAML writing API set if you are processing WPF-defined types, or types based on WPF. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 用法，请使用 来读取或加载 XAML （或 BAML）;和 用于写回 XAML。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usage, use for reading or loading XAML (or BAML); and for writing back XAML. 这些类在其实现内部使用 XAML 服务 Api 和 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器 .NET Framework;但是，它们还为特定于 WPF 的概念提供支持和专用的 XAML 架构上下文，例如依赖属性和 WPF 已知类型的优化。These classes use .NET Framework XAML Services APIs and the XAML readers and XAML writers internally in their implementation; however, they also provide support and specialized XAML schema context for WPF-specific concepts, such as optimizations for dependency properties and WPF known types.

summary.span: 加载 XAML 读取器的源，并将其输出写为对象关系图。

span.span: Loads source for a XAML reader and writes its output as an object graph.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Load (System.IO.Stream stream);
.method public static hidebysig object Load(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
Public Shared Function Load (stream As Stream) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ Load(System::IO::Stream ^ stream);
static member Load : System.IO.Stream -> obj

param.name: stream
param.span: 要作为输入加载的流。

span.span: The stream to load as input.

summary.span: 加载 XAML 读取器的 源，并将其输出写为对象关系图。

span.span: Loads a source for a XAML reader and writes its output as an object graph.

returns.span: 写为输出的对象关系图。

span.span: The object graph that is written as output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的不同签名为源 XAML 指定不同类型的输入。Different signatures for the method specify different types of input for the source XAML. 内部实现首先通过调用 创建 ，然后创建处理输入的专用 的新实例。The internal implementation first creates an by calling and then creates a new instance of a specialized that processes the input. 为了使 调用成功创建对象图，必须满足以下条件：In order for the call to successfully create an object graph, the following must be true: - 源是格式正确且有效的 XML。The source is well-formed and valid XML. - 源是语言级别的有效 XAML。The source is valid XAML at the language level. - 源 XAML 中指定的 XAML 类型必须解析为相关 XAML 命名空间中的支持类型。The XAML types that are specified in the source XAML must resolve to backing types in the relevant XAML namespaces. 例如，WPF 命名空间的 XAML 类型可解析为 XAML 中指定的 WPF XAML 命名空间;WPF 的程序集必须包含在项目中，或在运行时可用;依此类推。For example, XAML types for WPF namespaces can resolve to a WPF XAML namespace as specified in the XAML; the assemblies for WPF must be included in the project or available in the run time; and so on. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果正在处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 类型或基于 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]的类型，则不推荐使用 XAML 读取或 XAML 编写 API 集。 is not the recommended XAML reading or XAML writing API set if you are processing [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] types, or types based on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 用法，请使用 读取或加载 XAML;和 用于写回 XAML。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usage, use for reading or loading XAML; and for writing back XAML. 这些类在其实现内部使用 Api;但是，它们还提供对影响 XAML 读取和写入性质的 WPF 特定概念的支持，如依赖属性的优化。These classes use APIs internally in their implementation; however, they also provide support for WPF-specific concepts that influence the nature of XAML reading and writing, such as optimizations for dependency properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的不同签名为源 XAML 指定不同类型的输入。Different signatures for the method specify different types of input for the source XAML. 内部实现首先通过调用 创建 ，然后创建处理输入的专用 的新实例。The internal implementation first creates an by calling and then creates a new instance of a specialized that processes the input. 为了使 调用成功创建对象图，必须满足以下条件：In order for the call to successfully create an object graph, the following must be true: - 源是格式正确且有效的 XML。The source is well-formed and valid XML. - 源是语言级别的有效 XAML。The source is valid XAML at the language level. - 源 XAML 中指定的 XAML 类型必须解析为相关 XAML 命名空间中的支持类型。The XAML types that are specified in the source XAML must resolve to backing types in the relevant XAML namespaces. 例如，WPF 命名空间的 XAML 类型可解析为 XAML 中指定的 WPF XAML 命名空间;WPF 的程序集必须包含在项目中，或在运行时可用;依此类推。For example, XAML types for WPF namespaces can resolve to a WPF XAML namespace as specified in the XAML; the assemblies for WPF must be included in the project or be available in the run time; and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使 调用成功创建对象树，必须满足以下条件：In order for the call to successfully create an object tree, the following must be true: - `xaml` 输入是格式正确且有效的 XML。The `xaml` input is well-formed and valid XML. - `xaml` 输入是语言级别的有效 XAML。The `xaml` input is valid XAML at the language level. - 在 `xaml` 输入中指定的 XAML 类型必须解析为相关 XAML 命名空间中的支持类型。The XAML types that are specified in the `xaml` input must resolve to backing types in the relevant XAML namespaces. 例如，WPF 命名空间的 XAML 类型可解析为 XAML 中指定的 WPF XAML 命名空间;WPF 的程序集必须包含在项目中，或在运行时可用;依此类推。For example, XAML types for a WPF namespace can resolve to a WPF XAML namespace as specified in the XAML; the assemblies for WPF must be included in the project or be available in the run time; and so on. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果正在处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 类型或基于 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]的类型，则不推荐使用 XAML 读取或 XAML 编写 API 集。 is not the recommended XAML reading or XAML writing API set if you are processing [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] types, or types based on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 用法，请使用 来读取或加载 XAML，并使用 来编写回调 XAML。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usage, use for reading or loading XAML, and for writing back XAML. 这些类在其实现内部使用 Api;但是，它们还提供对影响 XAML 读取和写入性质的 WPF 特定概念的支持，如依赖属性的优化。These classes use APIs internally in their implementation; however, they also provide support for WPF-specific concepts that influence the nature of XAML reading and writing, such as optimizations for dependency properties.
